results.title: Tigo Paraguay | Devex
results.content: # Tigo Paraguay. Tigo Paraguay is the leading provider of mobile services, seeking to be an engine of digital inclusion and transformer of realities. The mobile service has a great coverage, covering 96% of the national territory and also offering international roaming in 220 countries and data services in 137 countries . The award-winning Tigo Money brand, with 2.2 million active clients , provides mobile financial services, thus favoring the social and economic inclusion of thousands of people. With this service, Tigo Money customers can send money orders, pay for services and access microcredits quickly, comfortably and safely, either directly through their phones or through the more than 4,000 Tigo outlets. Through Tigo TV and Internet Hogar, Tigo offers Pay TV and Internet to households in Paraguay. Contracting of the Fiber Optic Internet Service for the DIPE Office. See all **2 contracts** awarded to Tigo Paraguay.

results.title: TIGO Paraguay #25añosconTigo - Millicom
results.content: Millicom CEO Mauricio Ramos, EVP COO LatAm Esteban Iriarte and Paraguay GM Jose Perdomo lead TIGO's 25th anniversary celebrations. From the start, TIGO Paraguay has pioneered services and products with a fast and fit approach that helps to explain why, 25 years later, TIGO is Paraguay’s leading telco service provider, the third largest mobile operator in Latin America and a Great Place to Work award winning employer. To celebrate this month, TIGO Paraguay turned again to its 3.6 million customers, to say “Gracias!" ("Thank you!”). The press corps reported on TIGO's special Gala dinner; a kitchen-table discussion on the winning ingredients for a great customer service, in the style of the popular TV show Master Chef; a 25th birthday soundtrack entitled “La Cancion de Todos” (Song for Everyone) that featured artists from each region of the country; free subscriptions to Tigo Home’s premium channels and an "El Dia E" campaign that sent employees out to meet with and thank thousands of customers, as well as listen to their feedback and volunteer guidance, information and support on TIGO products and services.

results.title: Telefónica Celular del Paraguay S.A. (Tigo Paraguay) - BNamericas
results.content: (Tigo Paraguay)**, a company operating mainly in the ICT sector. Connect with its key contacts, projects, shareholders, related news and more.
